summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3907 for the improvement of alleys, Block 9, Hillman City Division No. 1, being the alleys between Rainier Avenue and 46th Avenue South, between Orcas Street and Mead Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47610, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
